about_the_game:
In this world taken over by aliens, you have been given a special mission on earth due to your immunity. Work, fight, and survive to be the hope of humanity. Every night, the battles will become more challenging, and you will have limited time to create your own strategy to overcome them.

During the day, you must explore enviroment to collect resources, plant and harvest crops. You must also prepare your strategy to protect your farming area with tower defense attributes.

As night begins, enemies spawn in waves to destroy your farm and yourself. Use tower defense items wisely and when defense systems are insufficient, get your hands dirty. Remember that protecting your farm is as important as staying alive, because if your plants are damaged, you won't earn any money, and if you don't earn any money, the mission will fail.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Day Cycle: Prepare for the night in the daytime. Each night you will face tougher enemies. Don't forget to improve yourself and your equipment. If you don't get to bed on time, you'll have to fight unhealed.
  • Missions: You will have a main mission and a side mission to progress. By completing the missions on time, you can earn extra money.
  • Farming: Initially, you will have 5 basic seed types to plant. Plan your planting strategy based on which plant will be worth more money each day. Also, pay attention to the characteristics of the plants, they can help you build your defense.
  • Loot: You will have limited time during the day. Make sure to explore and take part in activities like fishing, tree chopping, and mushroom picking to earn extra money.
  • Tower Defense: Create a unique strategy using different tower types and traps.Remember, you can't progress far by fighting alone. Don't neglect to upgrade your towers for them to be effective at all times.
  • Weapons: Your weapons will be one of the essentials during battle. You have 4 different weapons, each with a different skill. Masterfully eliminate enemies with the right combos.
  • Skills: You may have immunity, but you're not a superhero. After training, you'll have two abilities to use on the battlefield: one prevents damage while running away from enemies, and the other deals damage. Sometimes, you'll need to run away to fight when you are ready.
  • Enemies: Each enemy has a different attack pattern. Some of them gonna aim to kill you while others target your farm. Learn about enemy types and plan your strategy accordingly. Checking what they drop after defeating them can help your progress.
  • Boss: On certain days, you'll have to face much stronger special enemies along with normal ones. Don't worry, if you successfully survive the night, you'll receive special rewards.
  • Upgrades: If you have enough resources during your progress, you can upgrade almost all of your equipment and abilities. Choose your upgrades wisely to avoid running out of resources.
  • Statistics: You can check your statistics anytime during the game. To complete the main game objective, you need to have a certain amount of money. But while doing that, how about making a name for yourself among the world's best?
  • Home Design: You will be able to design your house from scratch the way you want. Items have passive abilities. (Spoiler: Only these traits will stay with you when you die and start over.)

STORY

When the aliens finally arrived on Earth, they had a single purpose: to exploit organic beings as tools and extract a special metal alloy they sought. To achieve this, they genetically modified humans, turning them into nothing more than enslaved beings with a single function.


Before things escalated, some humans managed to escape the crowded cities, seeking refuge in nature and vast forests, increasing their chances of survival. Moreover, some individuals had a strong immune system, resisting the transformation. The only way for them to change was to be killed by the zombies.

To produce the metal, zombies needed an organic energy source, which they could obtain by consuming certain products. However, their programming limited them to a single task, making organic food production impossible. Additionally, due to DNA modifications, exposure to the sun's radiation caused them to combust, making daytime surface ventures impossible.

The surviving humans established their bases underground, with everything they needed to survive. Yet, growing organic products like vegetables and fruits was challenging in the subterranean environment. To address this, they created small farming areas amidst the forested regions on the surface. They nurtured individuals with both farming and mechatronic engineering skills, who had the chance to join the 'New Life Program' on Mars by earning enough money to own their own farms. The reward at the end of this perilous task was immensely enticing, making it a risk worth taking for a better life.

name: FarmTech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 870
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)

short_description: FarmTech is a pixel-art roguelike farming simulation game that combines tower defense and action elements. Embark on a mission in an alien-occupied world. During the day, plant your fields, harvest crops, gather loot and earn money. At night, defend your farm against waves of incoming enemies.
